raw_comment: I notice that the most popular sport is basketball and the majority of the sports has 50% and higher basketball players. I wondered compared to other sports is basketball still a popularly played sports game. The impacts that this graph has on the community is the number of players who are playing basketball and the number of people who play basketball as a real paying job.  The graph is showing several different types of basketball players who are involved in major sports leagues. A catchy headline can be players who play major sports league in basketball.
ace_sentences: I notice that basketball is the most popular sport.
In most sports, basketball players are 50% or more of the players.
I wonder if basketball is still more popular than other sports.
This graph has an impact on the community.
This impact concerns the number of players who play basketball.
This impact also concerns the number of people who play basketball as a paying job.
The graph shows several types of basketball players.
These basketball players are involved in major sports leagues.
The headline is: Players who play in major sports leagues in basketball.
